purpose_text.para: Main control register for System PMU <s>.

reg_groups.reg_group: A group mapping that does not have a known primary

field_description.para: Trace enable. For more information on this field, see 'CoreSight PMU Architecture'.
Halt-on-debug. For more information on this field, see 'CoreSight PMU Architecture'.
Freeze-on-overflow. For more information on this field, see 'CoreSight PMU Architecture'.
Note that, if implemented by a System PMU, then freeze-on-overflow affects only the counters of System PMU <s>, not other System PMUs nor the PE PMU.
Not accessible. For more information on this field, see 'CoreSight PMU Architecture'.
Export enable. For more information on this field, see 'CoreSight PMU Architecture'.

note.para: Resetting the event counters does not affect any overflow flags.

field_value_description.para: Reset all event counters in System PMU <s> to zero.

field_description.para: Count enable. This field controls System PMU <s>.
Performance monitor overflow IRQs are only signaled by System PMU <s> when this field is 1.

access_permission_text.para: To access SPMCR_EL0 for System PMU <s>, set SPMSELR_EL0.SYSPMUSEL to s.
SPMCR_EL0 reads-as-zero and ignores writes if System PMU <s> is not implemented.

ps.name: MRS
MSRregister
